description: Southwest-corner, two-storey Charterhouse townhome with over 2,000 sq. ft. of fully fenced, irrigated yard plus 300 sq. ft. of covered patio for year-round use. The main level offers 9-ft ceilings and an open layout. The updated kitchen features an enlarged quartz island with waterfall edges, integrated fridge and dishwasher, and a five-burner gas cooktop. Engineered hardwood and California shutters run throughout, and the dining area includes a built-in banquette with storage. Upstairs are three bedrooms and a landing suitable for an office. The primary has 10'6 ceilings and a five-piece ensuite, with two additional well-sized bedrooms. Extra-wide side-by-side garage adds convenience. Located beside the Links at Hampton Cove and full access to The Hampton Club.
